definition: to be beneficial/to be good for
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
for the sake of/in order to

sentences.english: But the mood in Copenhagen yesterday did not seem conducive to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 但昨日哥本哈根的气氛似乎不利于各方达成妥协。

sentences.english: Today that a panel of arbitrators has decided in favor of our company.
sentences.chinese: 今天仲裁团做出了有利于我们公司的裁决。

sentences.english: Able to reveal weaknesses in the structure in order to optimize the structure design.
sentences.chinese: 能够揭示出结构的薄弱环节，以利于优化结构设计。

sentences.english: The advantage of Microsoft's method is that it works better for on-screen reading.
sentences.chinese: 微软的做法的好处在于它更利于屏幕阅读。

sentences.english: Biden said it would be good for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 拜登称高铁网络将有利于经济发展。

sentences.english: The emergence of back modern thought isin favor of the development of individuality.
sentences.chinese: 后现代思潮的出现有利于个性的自由发展。

sentences.english: Photo Gallery: Sydney Bondi Beach Sunbathing is a popular way to relax in Sydney.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼的日光浴是一个受欢迎的途径有利于松弛。

sentences.english: The N6 macroelementsand the MS microelements were advantageous to callus formation.
sentences.chinese: N6大量元素和MS微量元素有利于愈伤组织的分化。

sentences.english: Unhealthful fats include saturated and trans fats.
sentences.chinese: 不利于健康的脂肪包括饱和脂肪及转化脂肪。

sentences.english: Expanded economic exchanges between towns and rural areas can significantly increase farmers' incomes.
sentences.chinese: 扩大城乡经济往来有利于明显增加农民收入。

sentences.english: The excessive or insufficient silt-content is unfavorable to the vibrating consolidation of sandy soils.
sentences.chinese: 粉粒含量过多或太少均不利于砂土的振动固结。

sentences.english: Just saying “um” or “ah” here and there won’t do it.
sentences.chinese: 若只是一味的“嗯”或“啊”这样不利于谈话的进行。

sentences.english: The Thames flows rather slowly, which is very favourable for water transportation.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河流动得相当慢，十分有利于水路运输。

sentences.english: Also for her right-wing, pro-corporate alliance with US President Regan.
sentences.chinese: 还为她右翼，有利于企业联盟与美国总统里根。

sentences.english: But most assume it would boost the Lib Dems.
sentences.chinese: 但是大多数认为这会有利于自民党的发展。

sentences.english: The new retorting technique would develop extensively in China, it is rich in lignite and subbituminous coal.
sentences.chinese: 中国年轻煤多，有利于发展新法干馏技术。

definition: to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
bringing great benefits (idiom); very useful/of great service/to help greatly/to serve one well
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
